item.title: Temporarily disable all indexes of a postgresql table
item.description: Disable temporarily and reenable table indexes can be useful to speed up a large insert or update query
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Reset a PostgreSQL sequence and update column values
item.description: A simple way to reset and restart a broken PostgreSQL sequence.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Easy Webmapping with django-leaflet & django-geojson
item.description: Django-geojson is a set of tools to manipulate GeoJSON with Django. Django-leaflet allows you to use Leaflet in your Django projects. Together, they made webmapping really easy to play with.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Detect value changes between lines with PostgreSQL
item.description: A window function performs a calculation across a set of rows that are related to the current row. Here is an example of utilisation of window functions lag and lead to detect value changes between successive table rows.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: An efficient GIT workflow for mid/long term projects
item.description: Our full-web CAMM project at Makina Corpus has been going on for nearly two years and is running in production for over 18 months. I think it's my first project without any headache about our codebase and VCS management. So, I'll present our GIT workflow which has proven to be …
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: GIT tip : A simple .gitconfig file
item.description: As several friends have asked me this, I have posted my simple but quite useful .gitconfig file. Nothing special here, just a few aliases and some syntax highlighting :).
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Combine LDAP and classical authentication in django
item.description: How to provide an authentication system through a LDAP server and keep classical django authentication available to keep possibility to create users only in django without having them in the LDAP directory and be able to fallback on django authentication for all users in case of a LDAP server failure.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: GIT tip : Keep your branch clean with fixup and autosquash
item.description: Who is not tired of committing a "Remove pdb" or a "Fix a typo" few minutes or hours after committing a clean feature ? A few time ago, I discovered two useful options in GIT that work together : git commit --fixup and git rebase --autosquash. With these, you can easily merge …
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Capturez une signature manuscrite avec django-jsignature
item.description: Comment capturer une signature "électronique-manuscrite" dans Django avec l'application django-jsignature et le plugin javascript jSignature.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Quand le poney rencontre le lion - Djangocong Belfort 2013
item.description:
Cette année la Djangocong avait perdu son accent du sud pour partir à l'aventure et rencontrer le lion de Belfort. L'aventure est un mot pas si mal choisi quand on vient de Nantes car j'en ai profité pour tester tous les moyens de transport existant (ou presque) :

  • Tram 2 [Nantes …
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Playing with LiveServerTestCase and Selenium
item.description: At "Djangocon Tolosa", Julien phalip spoke about a new feature in django 1.4, LiveServerTestCase. A LiveServerTestCase launches a true HTTP server and gives a way to make HTTP requests in test cases. It can be useful to test REST API over a full HTTP protocol stack. Or, associated with …
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: De retour de Drupagora 2011
item.description: Je reviens de la première édition de Drupagora, à Paris, qui se veut plus oriéntée chefs de projet/décideurs que les habituels DrupalCamps de geeks. Au final, une formule plutôt satisfaisante : Conférences intéressantes, beaucoup de retours d'expérience et un peu de technique quand même (ouf !).
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: My short drush cheat sheet
item.description: Drush (DRUpal SHell) is a command-line which allows you to administer your Drupal site in console. It can be very useful when you have broken your site and when you can't access to your administration interface.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)

item.title: Generate a weblog with pelican
item.description: I'm testing pelican, a static blog generator written in python. From simple rst or markdown files (your blog entries), pelican can produce a nice blog with just a cli-tool command. Sources can be managed with your favourite DVCS and final site is easily hosted on any web server.
item.dc:creator: Florent Lebreton (fle)
